3691 - Storage Batteries Summary > TIANQI LITHIUM AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover storage batteries. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. TIANQI LITHIUM AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Kwinana Beach, Western Australia. It is headed by director & chief executive officer Frank Ha. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of USD38.22 million. Its net loss totalled USD319.95 million. TIANQI LITHIUM AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the manufacturing industry sector.
